metadata.title: CVE-2019-8354 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SoX 14.4.2. lsx_make_lpf in effect_i_dsp.c hasan integer overflow on the result of multiplication fed into malloc. Whenthe buffer is allocated, it is smaller than expected, leading to aheap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: sox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
